summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Rajat Kurdekar's Next.js 14 portfolio website. All core features are working correctly including animations, navigation, theme switching, and responsive design.

design_issues.issue: Preloader percentage/scramble text animation not clearly visible or detectable during testing

passed_tests: Hero section displays with stacked headings (Rajat/Kurdekar)
Character animations working (50 animated characters detected)
Navbar navigation links functional (WORK, ID, ARSENAL, CONTACT)
Theme toggle switches between dark and light modes with localStorage persistence
Works section horizontal scroll with 4 project cards and archive card
Works section curtain animation panels working
ID Card section displays with tilt effect on hover
Contact section with marquee animation and 4 social links (Telegram, Instagram, GitHub, Email)
All sections scroll into view properly
Social links have correct href attributes
